meanings.definition: The natural or artificial line formed by the waist of a human or animal.
meanings.sent1: She tied a ribbon around her waistline to accentuate her figure.
meanings.sent2: His waistline was defined by the belt he wore.
meanings.sent3: The cat's waistline looked like a perfect circle after eating too much.
meanings.sent4: The waistline of the river meandered through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The tailor measured the waistline carefully to ensure a perfect fit.

meanings.definition: The measurement around a person's waist.
meanings.sent1: Her waistline measurement was smaller than she expected.
meanings.sent2: He checked his waistline to track his fitness progress.
meanings.sent3: The waistline measurement was so big, it surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The waistline of the dress was too tight after the holiday feasting.
meanings.sent5: The doctor noted the waistline measurement as part of the health assessment.
